City Hall On-Demand
===================

As technology evolves, so does the way we connect with our community. The City of Corinth is dedicated to using digital tools to keep residents informed, engaged, and empowered while leading the way in digital government across Texas.

We’re committed to providing the services and information you need—anytime, anywhere—without requiring a trip to City Hall.

#### **City Administration**

Need to get in touch? Visit our
[Staff Directory](https://www.corinthtx.gov/directory)
for contact information or call City Hall at (940) 498-3200. For City Secretary inquiries, email us at
[CitySecretary@corinthtx.gov](mailto:CitySecretary@corinthtx.gov)
.

Moving? Paying a bill? Access these services and more through our
[Utility Billing Online Center](https://www.corinthtx.gov/utility-billing/page/utility-billing-online-center)
. You can also reach us at
[UtilityBilling@corinthtx.gov](mailto:UtilityBilling@corinthtx.gov)
or call (940) 498-3202. Call 811 before digging – they will have the various utilities flag lines. For more information, visit the
[Texas811 website](https://texas811.org/)
.

[Community Waste Disposal](https://www.communitywastedisposal.com/find-my-city/corinth/)
handles garbage, recycling, household hazardous waste, and yard waste services. Contact them at
[customerservice@cwd.to](mailto:customerservice@cwd.to)
or call (972) 392-9300, option 2.

Pay citations quickly and easily online by using the
[Municipal Court Payment Site](https://corinthtx.municipalonlinepayments.com/corinthtx/court/search)
. Have questions? Email
[Court@corinthtx.gov](mailto:Court@corinthtx.gov)
or call (940) 498-3201.

Submit building permits, site plans, or zoning requests digitally! Email your documents to
[Submittals@corinthtx.gov](mailto:Submittals@corinthtx.gov)
and if you have questions, we're here to help!

For inspections or inquiries, contact the Building Division at
[[Permits@corinthtx.gov](mailto:Permits@corinthtx.gov)](mailto:permits@corinthtx.gov)
or call (940) 498-3207.

Report code violations through our
[Report a Concern Center](https://www.corinthtx.gov/communications/page/report-concern-center)
, or contact our Neighborhood Services Coordinator at
[CodeEnforcement@corinthtx.gov](mailto:CodeEnforcement@corinthtx.gov)
or (940) 498-3274.

For non-emergency assistance, call (940) 349-1600, option 9. You can also use our
[Report a Concern Center](https://www.corinthtx.gov/communications/page/report-concern-center)
for non-emergency requests. Fire permits, inspections, and plan reviews can be scheduled at (940) 279-4590.

The Town of Hickory Creek provides animal shelter services for Corinth. Contact the
[Hickory Creek Animal Shelter](https://www.hickorycreek-tx.gov/animal)
at (940) 465-7444 for adoptions and owner releases. For other animal service calls, reach the Denton County Sheriff's Department at (940) 349-1600, option 9.

[Oncor Streetlight Outage Reporting](https://oncorstreetlight.com/)

Have concerns or requests? Use our
[Report a Concern Center](https://www.corinthtx.gov/communications/page/report-concern-center)
or call (940) 498-7501. For after-hours concerns, call (940) 465-6698.

Report park maintenance issues through our
[Report a Concern Center](https://www.corinthtx.gov/communications/page/report-concern-center)
or by calling (940) 498-7501. For after-hours concerns, call (940) 465-6692.
